original_title: Eagles Of Death Metal - DVD by Sexy
overview: Behind the scenes look at the recording of Eagles of Death Metal's "Death By Sexy" album. Features never-before seen rehearsals, videos, imaginary friends & behind-the-scenes footage that answer the burning questions, "How do they do it?" & "Will they do it to me?"  DVD by Sexy is unlike any rock docu-drama-reality ever built & will pound your funholes full of fantastic until you sexplode!!!
title: Eagles Of Death Metal - DVD by Sexy
